data.title: Auntie Mame, An Irreverent Escapade. a novel by Dennis, Patrick: About Fine Hardcover (1955) First Edition.
data.meta_description: First Edition. - Hardcover - Vanguard Press, New York - 1955 - Condition: About Fine - Very Good - First Edition, sixteenth printing. Hard cover 8vo in pink and black illustrated boards, mirroring DJ. About Fine book in Very Good unclipped DJ, now in clear protective cover. Heavy shelfwear, else Fine and unmarked; jacket edgeworn w/short small chips at crown. 280pp. Very presentable copy. - Auntie Mame, An Irreverent Escapade. a novel
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

International orders accepted by payment in U.S.D. through PayPal or checks payable through a U.S. bank. Please e-mail prior to return. NOTE: Unless prior arrangements have been made, orders for which payment has not been received within 7 days from notice of availability will be automatically cancelled.

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
